name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tape - AI Meeting Summaries, No Bots

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay focused on meetings, not note-taking. Effortlessly record meetings. Get timestamped, topical summaries in your native language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Press Record. Receive Timestamped Summaries Instantly⚡️

📼 Tape empowers you to record your screen effortlessly. With just a few clicks, it automatically generates transcripts and timestamped summaries of key topics, ensuring you never miss important details or insights from your meetings.

Here are the key benefits you can enjoy with 📼 Tape:

  🆓  Say goodbye to the hassle of note-taking.
  ⚡️  Review meeting recordings quickly with our timestamped summaries.
  ✅  Follow up at your convenience with Tape’s video replies or on-video comment features.
  🤖  Avoid the awkwardness of bots in your meetings.
  🌐  View transcripts and summaries in your native language.
